mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_screen ( scrType, scrBuyDt, scrPrice, scrSdate, scrEdate, refMno ) VALUES ( #{scrType}, #{scrBuyDt}, #{scrPrice}, #{scrSdate}, #{scrEdate}, #{movie.mNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_screen SET scrType=#{scrType}, scrBuyDt=#{scrBuyDt}, scrPrice=#{scrPrice}, scrSdate=#{scrSdate}, scrEdate=#{scrEdate}, refMno=#{movie.mno} WHERE scrNo=#{scrNo}
mapper.select: SELECT scr.*, mo.* FROM tbl_screen AS scr LEFT JOIN tbl_movie AS mo ON scr.refMno = mo.mNo WHERE scr.scrNo=#{scrNo}
